title: Out of these two parts, 1
clause_text: Out of these two parts, 1.00 shall be constructed by the mill owners in the form ofadditional tenements having 27.88 sq. m(300 sq. ft) carpet area each and shall be handed over to MHADA/Government and to be used for rehabilitation of mill workers.
